description:
Elder-Ham is reunited with Auntie Viv. After discovering which footrace Laura`s class is about to partake in, Hamtaro decides to run the same race. Auntie Viv and Boss bicker about who will win the race and Boss eventually takes the lead. Meanwhile, during the race, Laura sprains her ankle. Kana is unable to help, but Travis steps in. Boss sees this and goes back to check on Auntie Viv. Auntie Viv leaves after the race and Boss is sorry to see her go. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこすごすぎ! おハムばあさん
